data.name: Alchemy Emporium Demo
data.detailed_description:
In this Demo you will be able to try all the features of the game.
The only limit is the number of "working weeks" you can perform before the Demo ends.
For any kind of feedback please write us in the Steam Community Hub reachable from the store page clicking "Community Hub".
Have fun!
data.about_the_game:
In this Demo you will be able to try all the features of the game.
The only limit is the number of "working weeks" you can perform before the Demo ends.
For any kind of feedback please write us in the Steam Community Hub reachable from the store page clicking "Community Hub".
Have fun!
data.short_description: Welcome, promising young alchemist, to Alchemy Emporium! Manage your new emporium and become the greatest alchemist of all time!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 32-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 1.4GHz / AMD Athlon x4
  • Graphics: On-board graphic card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard on-board sound card
